attributes.action: We want a nationally recognised day for the British-Bangladeshis.
attributes.additional_details: The establishment of a nationally recognised British Bangladeshis day will be a significant moment in British history and a testament to the strength and resilience of the British Bangladeshi community. It will provide a platform for British Bangladeshis to come together, celebrate their heritage, and promote their cultural traditions and values.
attributes.background: We want the Government/Parliament to recognise and support a national day which celebrates the culture and contributions of the British Bangladeshi community.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The Government and Parliament are not responsible for the designation of days to celebrate particular nationalities.
